title: dear riot
body: dear riot first off all love the game. ok i have this problem and its starting to piss me off. How the fk are u ment to get out of bronze where there are to many fking afk dc and troll feeding scum of the earth in this game. fking do something about this problem cause all this game is doing is wasting my fking time playing it. how many keyboards i have broken cause off this game. there are prob alot of people having this problem so best thing to do is fix this from happening.

replies.body:
Hey Shnad 2G4U,

Sounds like you've been going through a rough time in ranked. We are working on a lot of things to combat afks/dcs and troll feeding. Below is a few excerpts that are relevant to you but you can find the full post here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq

> Intentional Feeder Detection
> 
> What about intentional feeders?
> 
> There is a separate system that focuses purely on feeders. If someone is feeding intentionally in multiple games then they will face temporary account suspensions and possible bans if they show no signs of reform.
> 
> LeaverBuster
> 
> I keep getting leavers in my game. What happens to them?
> 
> The first time a player leaves a game, they’ll see a pop-up explaining that leaving is not okay and then have to manually agree to not leave future games. If they continue to repeatedly ruin other players’ experiences, they’ll enter lower-priority matchmaking for a number of games. While in low priority queue, players will experience queue times that are 5, 10, even 20 minutes longer than a player who hasn't left games.
> 
> Players will know how many games they have in lower-priority, and if they join a premade group, that group will be notified they are playing with a chronic AFK/leaver and they’ll face the same lower-priority time penalty.
> 
> While we hope it doesn’t ever happen, if a player fails to stop AFKing or leaving while in lower-priority matchmaking, continued offenses will result in bans.
> 
> You can read more about LeaverBuster in Lyte’s post: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/updates-leaverbuster

As for getting out of bronze, I believe you can do it! All you have to do is focus on your own gameplay and work to improve your skills. Don't worry about other players, focus on your own mistakes and how to correct them. Check out this video and let me know what you think!
https://youtu.be/5MTO2a7ZFcc

Honestly I'm beginning to doubt the report system actually works, I mean I know the leaverbuster automated system works since my account got slammed after not being able to connect the other day when your servers were playing up. But the amount of trolls, AFK's or non-connects, intentional feeders, toxic immature keyboard warriors I've run into in the past month that I've been back have reminded me why I left in the first place.

I mean you only have to read through a couple of the comments in THIS THREAD to see the typical anti-social attitude that Riot is apparently trying to counteract. Yes there's a report button, but seriously, do the forum moderators actually actively read through these things and take action against the usual forum trolls with the "umadbro" "lol noob" comments?

I'm guessing they don't since there are plenty of posts that are more than a fortnight old with just that, you're not really discouraging that sort of behaviour nor do you promote a constructive forum environment when you let so many things slide. I realise it's the internet and educating people on how to behave like a functional member of society is ultimately a Sisyphean task, but maybe a harsher approach should be taken to both the in-game problem players and forum trolls alike.

If a post gets reported it gets checked, otherwise they don't care.

I have used the word "asshole" several times on these boards, but because one guy (who was being an asshole mind you) reported me (in 3 separate posts), i managed to get a 1 day ban.
You can get out of bronze,  there will be a few trolls and afks but I don't think that there is ever enough to use it as the reason to justify why you can't get out of bronze

I had a duo top towerdiving me as Riven because they argued who'd be top. It fucking sucks and it ruins the game for the team who loses because of it, but also for the other team because they are starved of proper competition.
Bronze is a breeze stop complaining.
Just keep playing dude, _learn_ lots of champs but master one or two in a certain lane and spam them in Ranked. Helps a lot. Mine was {{champion:103}}
Just pick Malzahar. Leblancs and Katarinas don't seem to understand that they CANT 1V1 YOU XD

It happens man I don't know why people want to troll but you need to keep trying and improve on yourself it isn't your team it is you that needs to improve not the team. That is the main thing you need to focus on in the game only focus on yourself don't worry about your team just about you. But don't get me wrong help your team but worry about yourself. And trust me you will climb it happened to me too. I used to be stuck in b5 and for my loss I always blamed the team for their mistakes when it was my mistakes when you realise what you did you wrong and improve on them you will climb right now I have climbed to b3 and right now in promos and my win rate is way higher than before. KEEP TRYING MAN AND REMEMBER BE NICE TO YOUR TEAM AND DON'T EVER RAGE AT THEM TRUST ME IT WILL HELP YOU WIN. Good luck!
